contentrichtext.text: {{Expand French|date=December 2008|Bretteville-le-Rabet}} {{Infobox French commune |name = Bretteville-le-Rabet |region = Basse-Normandie |department = Calvados |arrondissement = Caen |canton = Bretteville-sur-Laize |INSEE = 14097 |postal code = 14190 |mayor = Odile Lagrange |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = Cingal |longitude = -0.2581 |latitude = 49.0258 |elevation m = 100 |elevation min m = 75 |elevation max m = 125 |area km2 = 4.53 |population = 260 |population date = 2008 }} '''Bretteville-le-Rabet''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Calvados]] [[Departments of France|department]] in the [[Basse-Normandie]] [[Regions of France|region]] in northwestern [[France]]. ==Population== {{Historical populations |align=left| 1962|115| 1968|116| 1975|118| 1982|133| 1990|175| 1999|193| 2008|260| }} {{clear-left}} ==See also== *[[Communes of the Calvados department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} {{commonscat}} {{Calvados communes}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Brettevillelerabet}} [[Category:Communes of Calvados]] {{Calvados-geo-stub}}
